game_description: *Customized Bible Plan* Set up your weekly Bible reading plan and experience God at your own pace. "And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus." -- Philippians 4:7 Begin your journey with God Blessed, an app specially designed for Protestants. May God take away your worries and restore your strength and clarity to walk the path laid out for you. [Bible] Walk alongside the aisle in the medieval church to where a giant Bible unfolds. Read or listen to God's words and wisdom and may He bring you comfort, strength and peace. [Service] Click the parchment to teleport you to service scene where you can participate in online religious rituals, to pursue true holiness and purity. [Meditation] Whenever you need a moment of self-reflection or mind-relaxing, the soothing music and calming environment will lead you into a world of tranquility where focus is natural, pressure is relieved, and perspective is gained. God Bless You!
review_1: As a person of faith I've wanted something like this for some time. I like the idea of being transported to a church setting and the options for Bible reading, service and prayer/meditation. It has a great start with the basics. One big distraction, In all cases where you are read to or hear a service, its delivered by a electronic narrator. It's not bad but noticeable. I have so many thoughts about what id like to have in here and I say that in a good way. I want this app to be successful and I look forward to seeing more! I'll jump into the Discord and offer my suggestions.
review_2: This is such a great app! I tried the app since it was on Sidequest, now it has two more rooms to stay in, the space and the Bible are very user friendly and helpful. I love having the Bible read when I feel I need it!
review_3: Really nice app! Great place to read, or meditate.
